 }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static Dimensions GetJpegDimensions(string filePath)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using(var fs=File.OpenRead(filePath))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return GetJpegDimensions(fs);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static Dimensions GetJpegDimensions(Stream fs)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(!fs.CanSeek) throw new ArgumentException("Stream must be seekable");Di2015NewLine    long blockStart;Di2015NewLine    var buf = new byte[4];Di2015NewLine    fs.Read(buf, 0, 4);Di2015NewLine    if(buf.SequenceEqual(new byte[]{0xff, 0xd8, 0xff, 0xe0}))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        blockStart = fs.Position;Di2015NewLine        fs.Read(buf, 0, 2);Di2015NewLine        var blockLength = ((buf[0] << 8) + buf[1]);Di2015NewLine        fs.Read(buf, 0, 4);Di2015NewLine        if(Encoding.ASCII.GetString(buf, 0, 4) == "JFIF" Di2015NewLine            && fs.ReadByte() == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            blockStart += blockLength;Di2015NewLine            while(blockStart < fs.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                fs.Position = blockStart;Di2015NewLine                fs.Read(buf, 0, 4);Di2015NewLine                blockLength = ((buf[2] << 8) + buf[3]);Di2015NewLine                if(blockLength >= 7 && buf[0] == 0xff && buf[1] == 0xc0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    fs.Position += 1;Di2015NewLine                    fs.Read(buf, 0, 4);Di2015NewLine                    var height = (buf[0] << 8) + buf[1];Di2015NewLine                    var width = (buf[2] << 8) + buf[3];Di2015NewLine                    return new Dimensions(width, height);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                blockStart += blockLength + 2;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class DimensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly int width;Di2015NewLine    private readonly int height;Di2015NewLine    public Dimensions(int width, int height)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.width = width;Di2015NewLine        this.height = height;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public int WidthDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get{return width;}Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public int HeightDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get{return height;}Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return string.Format("width:{0}, height:{1}", Width, Height);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4099309Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string GetPropertyName<TSource, TProperty>(this Expression<Func<TSource, TProperty>> expression) {Di2015NewLine    Contract.Requires<ArgumentNullException>(expression != null);Di2015NewLine    Contract.Ensures(Contract.Result<string>() != null);Di2015NewLine    PropertyInfo propertyInfo = GetPropertyInfo(expression);Di2015NewLine    return propertyInfo.Name;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static PropertyInfo GetPropertyInfo<TSource, TProperty>(this Expression<Func<TSource, TProperty>> expression) {Di2015NewLine    Contract.Requires<ArgumentNullException>(expression != null);Di2015NewLine    Contract.Ensures(Contract.Result<PropertyInfo>() != null);Di2015NewLine    var memberExpression = expression.Body as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine    Guard.Against<ArgumentException>(memberExpression == null, "Expression does not represent a member expression.");Di2015NewLine    var propertyInfo = memberExpression.Member as PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLine    Guard.Against<ArgumentException>(propertyInfo == null, "Expression does not represent a property expression.");Di2015NewLine    Type type = typeof(TSource);Di2015NewLine    Guard.Against<ArgumentException>(type != propertyInfo.ReflectedType && type.IsSubclassOf(propertyInfo.ReflectedType));Di2015NewLine    return propertyInfo;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4099730Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic enum ChessColor {Di2015NewLine    White,Di2015NewLine    BlackDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ChessPiece {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //  Expose this so the board can query what image to display.Di2015NewLine    //  The Board will know where to draw the image, and will know whatDi2015NewLine    //  piece is in each sqaure... it simply queries the piece for the image,Di2015NewLine    //  and draws that image on the Canvas in the appropriate location.Di2015NewLine    private Image DisplayedImage;Di2015NewLine    private ChessColor DisplayedColor;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //  You can easily determine valid new locations for a pieceDi2015NewLine    //  by subtracting the ValidMoves points from the CurrentSquareDi2015NewLine    //  by calling CurrentSquare.Offset(validMove)Di2015NewLine    private Point CurrentSquare;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //  In the form (-1, -2), meaning left 1, up 2 (the knight)Di2015NewLine    private Point[] ValidMoves;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ChessPiece(Image image, ChessColor color) {Di2015NewLine        DisplayedImage = image;Di2015NewLine        DisplayedColor = color;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class KingPiece : ChessPiece {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public KingPiece (Image image, ChessColor color) : base (image, color) {Di2015NewLine        ValidMoves[0] = new Point (0,-1);    //  Up 1Di2015NewLine        ValidMoves[1] = new Point (1,-1);    //  Up 1, Right 1Di2015NewLine        ValidMoves[2] = new Point (1,0);     //  Right 1Di2015NewLine          ...Di2015NewLine        ValidMoves[7] = new Point (-1, -1);  //  Left 1, Up 1Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ChessBoard {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //  Gives you a handle to whatever piece is in a square, Di2015NewLine    //  or null if no piece is currently located thereDi2015NewLine    private ChessPiece[,] board;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //  These two values are used to determine, based off the Di2015NewLine    //  square position, where the image should be drawnDi2015NewLine    private int SquareWidth;    //  Number of pixels wideDi2015NewLine    private int SquareHeight;    //  Number of pixels highDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //  There is no SetSquare(), or at least it's private, because the Di2015NewLine    //  board itself determines where pieces are moved to.Di2015NewLine    //  The board also knows the pixel coordinates of each square, and Di2015NewLine    //  controls the canvas and painting the image thereDi2015NewLine      ...Di2015NewLine
4099730Di2015UniqueSeparatorfor (int x = 0; x < 8; x++) {        //  left to rightDi2015NewLine    for (int y = 0; y < 8; y++) {    //  bottom to topDi2015NewLine        ChessPiece piece = board[x, y];Di2015NewLine        Image imageToDraw = piece.Image;Di2015NewLine        Point whereToDraw = new Point(x * SquareWidth, y * SquareHeight);Di2015NewLine          //  Clear old imageDi2015NewLine          //  Draw image imageToDraw at point whereToDrawDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4100126Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IFoodDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool IsTasty { get; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic class Hamburger : IFoodDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public bool IsTasty {get{ return true;}}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic class PeaSoup : IFoodDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public bool IsTasty { get { return false; } }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class FoodFactoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<string, Type> _foundFoodTypes =Di2015NewLine        new Dictionary<string, Type>(StringComparer.OrdinalIgnoreCase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Scan all specified assemblies after food.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public void ScanForFood(params Assembly[] assemblies)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var foodType = typeof (IFood);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var assembly in assemblies)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var type in assembly.GetTypes())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!foodType.IsAssignableFrom(type) || type.IsAbstract || type.IsInterface)Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                _foundFoodTypes.Add(type.Name, type);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Create some food!Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="name"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public IFood Create(string name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type type;Di2015NewLine        if (!_foundFoodTypes.TryGetValue(name, out type))Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Failed to find food named '" + name + "'.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (IFood)Activator.CreateInstance(type);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4100126Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar factory = new FoodFactory();Di2015NewLinefactory.ScanForFood(Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Is a hamburger tasty? " + factory.Create("Hamburger").IsTasty);Di2015NewLine

4103184Di2015UniqueSeparator// TODO: Boil down to two with Generics if possibleDi2015NewLine#region AutoMapTypeConvertersDi2015NewLine// Automap type converter definitions for Di2015NewLine// int, int?, decimal, decimal?, bool, bool?, Int64, Int64?, DateTimeDi2015NewLine// Automapper string to int?Di2015NewLineprivate class NullIntTypeConverter : TypeConverter<string, int?>Di2015NewLine{   protected override int? ConvertCore(string source)Di2015NewLine    {   if (source == null)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {   int result;Di2015NewLine            return Int32.TryParse(source, out result) ? (int?) result : null;Di2015NewLine}   }   }Di2015NewLine// Automapper string to intDi2015NewLineprivate class IntTypeConverter : TypeConverter<string, int>Di2015NewLine{   protected override int ConvertCore(string source)Di2015NewLine    {   if (source == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new MappingException("null string value cannot convert to non-nullable return type.");Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return Int32.Parse(source); Di2015NewLine}   }Di2015NewLine// Automapper string to decimal?Di2015NewLineprivate class NullDecimalTypeConverter : TypeConverter<string, decimal?>Di2015NewLine{   protected override decimal? ConvertCore(string source)Di2015NewLine    {   if (source == null)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {   decimal result;Di2015NewLine            return Decimal.TryParse(source, out result) ? (decimal?) result : null;Di2015NewLine}   }   }Di2015NewLine// Automapper string to decimalDi2015NewLineprivate class DecimalTypeConverter : TypeConverter<string, decimal>Di2015NewLine{   protected override decimal ConvertCore(string source)Di2015NewLine    {   if (source == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new MappingException("null string value cannot convert to non-nullable return type.");Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return Decimal.Parse(source); Di2015NewLine}   }Di2015NewLine// Automapper string to bool?Di2015NewLineprivate class NullBooleanTypeConverter : TypeConverter<string, bool?>Di2015NewLine{   protected override bool? ConvertCore(string source)Di2015NewLine    {   if (source == null)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {   bool result;Di2015NewLine            return Boolean.TryParse(source, out result) ? (bool?) result : null;Di2015NewLine}   }   }Di2015NewLine// Automapper string to boolDi2015NewLineprivate class BooleanTypeConverter : TypeConverter<string, bool>Di2015NewLine{   protected override bool ConvertCore(string source)Di2015NewLine    {   if (source == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new MappingException("null string value cannot convert to non-nullable return type.");Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return Boolean.Parse(source); Di2015NewLine}   }Di2015NewLine// Automapper string to Int64?Di2015NewLineprivate class NullInt64TypeConverter : TypeConverter<string, Int64?>Di2015NewLine{   protected override Int64? ConvertCore(string source)Di2015NewLine    {   if (source == null)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {   Int64 result;Di2015NewLine            return Int64.TryParse(source, out result) ? (Int64?)result : null;Di2015NewLine}   }   }Di2015NewLine// Automapper string to Int64Di2015NewLineprivate class Int64TypeConverter : TypeConverter<string, Int64>Di2015NewLine{   protected override Int64 ConvertCore(string source)Di2015NewLine    {   if (source == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new MappingException("null string value cannot convert to non-nullable return type.");Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return Int64.Parse(source); Di2015NewLine}   }Di2015NewLine// Automapper string to DateTime?Di2015NewLine// In our case, the datetime will be a JSON2.org datetimeDi2015NewLine// Example: "/Date(1288296203190)/"Di2015NewLineprivate class NullDateTimeTypeConverter : TypeConverter<string, DateTime?>Di2015NewLine{   protected override DateTime? ConvertCore(string source)Di2015NewLine    {   if (source == null)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {   DateTime result;Di2015NewLine            return DateTime.TryParse(source, out result) ? (DateTime?) result : null;Di2015NewLine}   }   }Di2015NewLine// Automapper string to DateTimeDi2015NewLineprivate class DateTimeTypeConverter : TypeConverter<string, DateTime>Di2015NewLine{   protected override DateTime ConvertCore(string source)Di2015NewLine    {   if (source == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new MappingException("null string value cannot convert to non-nullable return type.");Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return DateTime.Parse(source); Di2015NewLine}   }Di2015NewLine#endregionDi2015NewLine

4103423Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data.SqlClient;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data.SqlTypes;Di2015NewLineusing Microsoft.SqlServer.Server;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Permissions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ExtractSqlAssembly {Di2015NewLine    [PermissionSet(SecurityAction.Demand, Unrestricted = true, Name = "FullTrust")]Di2015NewLine    public partial class SaveSqlAssembly {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [SqlProcedure]Di2015NewLine        public static void SaveAssembly(string assemblyName, string path) {Di2015NewLine            string sql = @"SELECT AF.content FROM sys.assembly_files AF JOIN sys.assemblies A ON AF.assembly_id = A.assembly_id where AF.file_id = 1 AND A.name = @assemblyname";Di2015NewLine            using (SqlConnection conn = new SqlConnection("context connection=true")) {Di2015NewLine                using (SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand(sql, conn)) {Di2015NewLine                    SqlParameter param = new SqlParameter("@assemblyname", SqlDbType.VarChar);Di2015NewLine                    param.Value = assemblyName;Di2015NewLine                    cmd.Parameters.Add(param);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    cmd.Connection.Open();  // Read in the assembly byte streamDi2015NewLine                    SqlDataReader reader = cmd.ExecuteReader();Di2015NewLine                    reader.Read();Di2015NewLine                    SqlBytes bytes = reader.GetSqlBytes(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // write the byte stream out to diskDi2015NewLine                    FileStream bytestream = new FileStream(path, FileMode.CreateNew);Di2015NewLine                    bytestream.Write(bytes.Value, 0, (int)bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine                    bytestream.Close();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4106840Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static double CalculatePi(int maxRecursion)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double result = 1;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = maxRecursion -1; i >= 1; i-- )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result = 1 + i / (2.0 * i + 1) * result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return result * 2;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

4108907Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class EnumExtDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Check to see if a flags enumeration has a specific flag set.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="variable">Flags enumeration to check</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="value">Flag to check for</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static bool HasFlag(this Enum variable, Enum value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (variable == null)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (value == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("value");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Not as good as the .NET 4 version of this function, but should be good enoughDi2015NewLine        if (!Enum.IsDefined(variable.GetType(), value))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException(string.Format(Di2015NewLine                "Enumeration type mismatch.  The flag is of type '{0}', was expecting '{1}'.",Di2015NewLine                value.GetType(), variable.GetType()));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ulong num = Convert.ToUInt64(value);Di2015NewLine        return ((Convert.ToUInt64(variable) & num) == num);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4109563Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ReflectorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static string GetPropertyName<T>(Expression<Func<T, object>> expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var lambdaEx = expression as LambdaExpression;Di2015NewLine        if (lambdaEx == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("expression");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MemberExpression memberExpression = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (lambdaEx.Body.NodeType == ExpressionType.Convert)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var unaryExpression = lambdaEx.Body as UnaryExpression;Di2015NewLine            if (unaryExpression == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("expression");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (unaryExpression.Operand.NodeType == ExpressionType.MemberAccess)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                memberExpression = unaryExpression.Operand as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (lambdaEx.Body.NodeType == ExpressionType.MemberAccess)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            memberExpression = lambdaEx.Body as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (memberExpression == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("expression");Di2015NewLine            return memberExpression.Member.Name;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Please ignore the whitespace"));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Success");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Error : {0}", ex.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("\\n\\nPress any key to exit...");Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineinternal class CompareWithoutWhitespace : StringComparerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly StringComparison _stringComparison;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CompareWithoutWhitespace(StringComparison stringComparison)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _stringComparison = stringComparison;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int Compare(string x, string y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return String.Compare(RemoveWhitespace(x), RemoveWhitespace(y), _stringComparison);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(string x, string y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return String.Equals(RemoveWhitespace(x), RemoveWhitespace(y), _stringComparison);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode(string obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return RemoveWhitespace(obj).GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string RemoveWhitespace(string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(input)) return input;Di2015NewLine        input = input.Replace(Environment.NewLine, "");Di2015NewLine        return input.Replace(" ", "");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4114681Di2015UniqueSeparator[AttributeUsage( AttributeTargets.Class, AllowMultiple = true, Inherited = true )]Di2015NewLinepublic sealed class PropertiesMustMatchAttribute : ValidationAttribute {Di2015NewLine    private const string _defaultErrorMessage = "'{0}' and '{1}' do not match.";Di2015NewLine    private readonly object _typeId = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public PropertiesMustMatchAttribute( string originalProperty, string confirmProperty )Di2015NewLine        : base( _defaultErrorMessage ) {Di2015NewLine        OriginalProperty = originalProperty;Di2015NewLine        ConfirmProperty = confirmProperty;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string ConfirmProperty { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public string OriginalProperty { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object TypeId {Di2015NewLine        get {Di2015NewLine            return _typeId;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string FormatErrorMessage( string name ) {Di2015NewLine        return String.Format( CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture, ErrorMessageString,Di2015NewLine            OriginalProperty, ConfirmProperty );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool IsValid( object value ) {Di2015NewLine        PropertyDescriptorCollection properties = TypeDescriptor.GetProperties( value );Di2015NewLine        object originalValue = properties.Find( OriginalProperty, true /* ignoreCase */).GetValue( value );Di2015NewLine        object confirmValue = properties.Find( ConfirmProperty, true /* ignoreCase */).GetValue( value );Di2015NewLine        return Object.Equals( originalValue, confirmValue );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4116827Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var testCases = new List<string>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        "C11H22O12",Di2015NewLine        "Al2O3",Di2015NewLine        "O3",Di2015NewLine        "C",Di2015NewLine        "H2O"Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (string testCase in testCases)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Testing {0}", testCase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var formula = FormulaFromString(testCase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var element in formula)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("{0} : {1}", element.Element, element.Count);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* Produced the following outputDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Testing C11H22O12Di2015NewLine    C : 11Di2015NewLine    H : 22Di2015NewLine    O : 12Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Testing Al2O3Di2015NewLine    Al : 2Di2015NewLine    O : 3Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Testing O3Di2015NewLine    O : 3Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Testing CDi2015NewLine    C : 1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Testing H2ODi2015NewLine    H : 2Di2015NewLine    O : 1Di2015NewLine        */Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static Collection<ChemicalFormulaComponent> FormulaFromString(string chemicalFormula)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Collection<ChemicalFormulaComponent> formula = new Collection<ChemicalFormulaComponent>();Di2015NewLine    string elementRegex = "([A-Z][a-z]*)([0-9]*)";Di2015NewLine    string validateRegex = "^(" + elementRegex + ")+$";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!Regex.IsMatch(chemicalFormula, validateRegex))Di2015NewLine        throw new FormatException("Input string was in an incorrect format.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (Match match in Regex.Matches(chemicalFormula, elementRegex))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string name = match.Groups[1].Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int count =Di2015NewLine            match.Groups[2].Value != "" ?Di2015NewLine            int.Parse(match.Groups[2].Value) :Di2015NewLine            1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        formula.Add(new ChemicalFormulaComponent(ChemicalElement.ElementFromSymbol(name), count));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return formula;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4116895Di2015UniqueSeparatorint n = 0x5b; // 1011011Di2015NewLine
4116895Di2015UniqueSeparatorprintf("%x", n); // this prints "5b"Di2015NewLine
4116895Di2015UniqueSeparatorprintf("%s", "0b"); // common prefix to denote that binary followsDi2015NewLinebool leading = true; // we're processing leading zeroesDi2015NewLine// starting with the most significant bit to the leastDi2015NewLinefor (int i = sizeof(n) * CHAR_BIT - 1; i >= 0; --i) {Di2015NewLine    int bit = (n >> i) & 1;Di2015NewLine    leading |= bit; // if the bit is 1, we are no longer reading leading zeroesDi2015NewLine    if (!leading)Di2015NewLine        printf("%d", bit);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineif (leading) // all zero, so just print 0Di2015NewLine    printf("0");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// at this point, for n = 0x5b, we'll have printed 0b1011011Di2015NewLine

4120932Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate unsafe string InternalSubString(int startIndex, int length, bool fAlwaysCopy)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (((startIndex == 0) && (length == this.Length)) && !fAlwaysCopy)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Allocate new (separate) stringDi2015NewLine    string str = FastAllocateString(length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Copy chars from old string to new stringDi2015NewLine    fixed (char* chRef = &str.m_firstChar)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        fixed (char* chRef2 = &this.m_firstChar)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            wstrcpy(chRef, chRef2 + startIndex, length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return str;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4120950Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private int numberOfSegments = 4;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private double[,] multipliers;Di2015NewLine    private List<Point> points;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private NumericUpDown numberOfSegmentsUpDown;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Form1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.numberOfSegmentsUpDown = new NumericUpDown();Di2015NewLine        this.numberOfSegmentsUpDown.Value = this.numberOfSegments;Di2015NewLine        this.numberOfSegmentsUpDown.ValueChanged += new System.EventHandler(this.numberOfSegmentsUpDown_ValueChanged);Di2015NewLine        this.numberOfSegmentsUpDown.Dock = DockStyle.Bottom;Di2015NewLine        this.Controls.Add(this.numberOfSegmentsUpDown);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.points = new List<Point> { Di2015NewLine            new Point(100, 110), Di2015NewLine            new Point(50, 60), Di2015NewLine            new Point(100, 10)};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.PrecomputeMultipliers();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void PrecomputeMultipliers()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.multipliers = new double[this.points.Count, this.numberOfSegments + 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double pointCountMinusOne = (double)(this.points.Count - 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int currentStep = 0; currentStep <= this.numberOfSegments; currentStep++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double t = currentStep / (double)this.numberOfSegments;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int pointIndex1 = 0; pointIndex1 < this.points.Count; pointIndex1++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                double point1Weight = pointIndex1 / pointCountMinusOne;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                double currentMultiplier = 1;Di2015NewLine                for (int pointIndex2 = 0; pointIndex2 < this.points.Count; pointIndex2++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (pointIndex2 == pointIndex1)Di2015NewLine                        continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    double point2Weight = pointIndex2 / pointCountMinusOne;Di2015NewLine                    currentMultiplier *= (t - point2Weight) / (point1Weight - point2Weight);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                this.multipliers[pointIndex1, currentStep] = currentMultiplier;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnPaint(PaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnPaint(e);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Point? previousPoint = null;Di2015NewLine        for (int currentStep = 0; currentStep <= numberOfSegments; currentStep++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double sumX = 0;Di2015NewLine            double sumY = 0;Di2015NewLine            for (int pointIndex = 0; pointIndex < points.Count; pointIndex++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sumX += points[pointIndex].X * multipliers[pointIndex, currentStep];Di2015NewLine                sumY += points[pointIndex].Y * multipliers[pointIndex, currentStep];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Point newPoint = new Point((int)Math.Round(sumX), (int)Math.Round(sumY));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (previousPoint.HasValue)Di2015NewLine                e.Graphics.DrawLine(Pens.Black, previousPoint.Value, newPoint);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            previousPoint = newPoint;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int pointIndex = 0; pointIndex < this.points.Count; pointIndex++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Point point = this.points[pointIndex];Di2015NewLine            e.Graphics.FillRectangle(Brushes.Black, new Rectangle(point.X - 1, point.Y - 1, 2, 2));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnMouseClick(MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnMouseClick(e);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (e.Button == MouseButtons.Left)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.points.Add(e.Location);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.points.RemoveAt(this.points.Count - 1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.PrecomputeMultipliers();Di2015NewLine        this.Invalidate();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void numberOfSegmentsUpDown_ValueChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.numberOfSegments = (int)this.numberOfSegmentsUpDown.Value;Di2015NewLine        this.PrecomputeMultipliers();Di2015NewLine        this.Invalidate();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4124273Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ObservableDrainExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IObservable<TOut> Drain<TSource, TOut>(this IObservable<TSource> source, Di2015NewLine        Func<TSource, IObservable<TOut>> selector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Observable.Defer(() =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            BehaviorSubject<Unit> queue = new BehaviorSubject<Unit>(new Unit());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return sourceDi2015NewLine                .Zip(queue, (v, q) => v)Di2015NewLine                .SelectMany(v => selector(v)Di2015NewLine                    .Do(_ => { }, () => queue.OnNext(new Unit()))Di2015NewLine                );Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4124469Di2015UniqueSeparatorColor.GetBrightness
4124469Di2015UniqueSeparatorIf h < 0 Then h = h + 360
4124469Di2015UniqueSeparatorPublic Function RGBtoHSV(ByVal R As Integer, ByVal G As Integer, ByVal B As Integer) As HSVDi2015NewLine     ''# Normalize the RGB values by scaling them to be between 0 and 1Di2015NewLine     Dim red As Decimal = R / 255DDi2015NewLine     Dim green As Decimal = G / 255DDi2015NewLine     Dim blue As Decimal = B / 255DDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     Dim minValue As Decimal = Math.Min(red, Math.Min(green, blue))Di2015NewLine     Dim maxValue As Decimal = Math.Max(red, Math.Max(green, blue))Di2015NewLine     Dim delta As Decimal = maxValue - minValueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     Dim h As DecimalDi2015NewLine     Dim s As DecimalDi2015NewLine     Dim v As Decimal = maxValueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     ''# Calculate the hue (in degrees of a circle, between 0 and 360)Di2015NewLine     Select Case maxValueDi2015NewLine        Case redDi2015NewLine           If green >= blue ThenDi2015NewLine               If delta = 0 ThenDi2015NewLine                  h = 0Di2015NewLine               ElseDi2015NewLine                  h = 60 * (green - blue) / deltaDi2015NewLine               End IfDi2015NewLine           ElseIf green < blue ThenDi2015NewLine               h = 60 * (green - blue) / delta + 360Di2015NewLine           End IfDi2015NewLine        Case greenDi2015NewLine           h = 60 * (blue - red) / delta + 120Di2015NewLine        Case blueDi2015NewLine           h = 60 * (red - green) / delta + 240Di2015NewLine     End SelectDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     ''# Calculate the saturation (between 0 and 1)Di2015NewLine     If maxValue = 0 ThenDi2015NewLine        s = 0Di2015NewLine     ElseDi2015NewLine        s = 1D - (minValue / maxValue)Di2015NewLine     End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     ''# Scale the saturation and value to a percentage between 0 and 100Di2015NewLine     s *= 100Di2015NewLine     v *= 100Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  ''# Return a color in the new color spaceDi2015NewLine  Return New HSV(CInt(Math.Round(h, MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero)), _Di2015NewLine                 CInt(Math.Round(s, MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero)), _Di2015NewLine                 CInt(Math.Round(v, MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero)))Di2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLine
4124469Di2015UniqueSeparatorPublic Function HSVtoRGB(ByVal H As Integer, ByVal S As Integer, ByVal V As Integer) As RGBDi2015NewLine     ''# Scale the Saturation and Value components to be between 0 and 1Di2015NewLine     Dim hue As Decimal = HDi2015NewLine     Dim sat As Decimal = S / 100DDi2015NewLine     Dim val As Decimal = V / 100DDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     Dim r As DecimalDi2015NewLine     Dim g As DecimalDi2015NewLine     Dim b As DecimalDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     If sat = 0 ThenDi2015NewLine       ''# If the saturation is 0, then all colors are the same.Di2015NewLine       ''# (This is some flavor of gray.)Di2015NewLine        r = valDi2015NewLine        g = valDi2015NewLine        b = valDi2015NewLine     ElseDi2015NewLine        ''# Calculate the appropriate sector of a 6-part color wheelDi2015NewLine        Dim sectorPos As Decimal = hue / 60DDi2015NewLine        Dim sectorNumber As Integer = CInt(Math.Floor(sectorPos))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ''# Get the fractional part of the sectorDi2015NewLine        ''# (that is, how many degrees into the sector you are)Di2015NewLine        Dim fractionalSector As Decimal = sectorPos - sectorNumberDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ''# Calculate values for the three axes of the colorDi2015NewLine        Dim p As Decimal = val * (1 - sat)Di2015NewLine        Dim q As Decimal = val * (1 - (sat * fractionalSector))Di2015NewLine        Dim t As Decimal = val * (1 - (sat * (1 - fractionalSector)))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ''# Assign the fractional colors to red, green, and blueDi2015NewLine        ''# components based on the sector the angle is inDi2015NewLine        Select Case sectorNumberDi2015NewLine           Case 0, 6Di2015NewLine              r = valDi2015NewLine              g = tDi2015NewLine              b = pDi2015NewLine           Case 1Di2015NewLine              r = qDi2015NewLine              g = valDi2015NewLine              b = pDi2015NewLine           Case 2Di2015NewLine              r = pDi2015NewLine              g = valDi2015NewLine              b = tDi2015NewLine           Case 3Di2015NewLine              r = pDi2015NewLine              g = qDi2015NewLine              b = valDi2015NewLine           Case 4Di2015NewLine              r = tDi2015NewLine              g = pDi2015NewLine              b = valDi2015NewLine           Case 5Di2015NewLine              r = valDi2015NewLine              g = pDi2015NewLine              b = qDi2015NewLine        End SelectDi2015NewLine     End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     ''# Scale the red, green, and blue values to be between 0 and 255Di2015NewLine     r *= 255Di2015NewLine     g *= 255Di2015NewLine     b *= 255Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     ''# Return a color in the new color spaceDi2015NewLine     Return New RGB(CInt(Math.Round(r, MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero)), _Di2015NewLine                    CInt(Math.Round(g, MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero)), _Di2015NewLine                    CInt(Math.Round(b, MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero)))Di2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLine
4124493Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar output = Math.Ceiling(amount / 4);Di2015NewLine

4125008Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool IsDirty(PostUpdateEvent @event) {Di2015NewLine    // Get all the mapped property namesDi2015NewLine    var propertyNames = @event.Session.Factory.GetClassMetadata(@event.Entity.GetType()).PropertyNames;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get the property index to ignoreDi2015NewLine    var propertyIndexesToIgnore = @event.Entity.GetType().GetProperties()Di2015NewLine        .Where(p => p.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(IgnoreLoggingAttribute), false).Count() > 0)Di2015NewLine        .Select(p => Array.IndexOf(propertyNames, p.Name)).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (@event.OldState != null && @event.State != null) {Di2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < @event.OldState.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine            if (!propertyIndexesToIgnore.Contains(i) && !@event.OldState[i].Equals(@event.State[i]))Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4127851Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass AdjacencyMatrixDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // representation of the adjacency matrix (AM)Di2015NewLine    private readonly int[,] m_Matrix;Di2015NewLine    // mapping of character codes to indices in the AMDi2015NewLine    private readonly Dictionary<char,int> m_Mapping;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public AdjacencyMatrix( string edgeVector )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // using LINQ we can identify and order the distinct charactersDi2015NewLine        char[] distinctChars = edgeVector.Distinct().OrderBy(x => x);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        m_Mapping = distinctChars.Select((c,i)=>new { Vertex = c, Index = i })Di2015NewLine                                 .ToDictionary(x=>x.Vertex, x=>x.Index);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // build the adjacency cost matrix here...Di2015NewLine        // TODO: I leave this up to the reader to complete ... :-DDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // retrieves an entry from within the adjacency matrix given two charactersDi2015NewLine    public int this[char v1, char v2]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return m_Matrix[m_Mapping[v1], m_Mapping[v2]];Di2015NewLine        private set { m_Matrix[m_Mapping[v1], m_Mapping[v2]] = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4129328Di2015UniqueSeparator// A lightweight class to help you compute the minimum, maximum, averageDi2015NewLine// and standard deviation of a set of values. Call Clear(), then Add(eachDi2015NewLine// value); you can compute the average and standard deviation at any time by Di2015NewLine// calling Avg() and StdDeviation().Di2015NewLineclass StatisticDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public double Min;Di2015NewLine    public double Max;Di2015NewLine    public double Count;Di2015NewLine    public double SumTotal;Di2015NewLine    public double SumOfSquares;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Clear()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SumOfSquares = Min = Max = Count = SumTotal = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void Add(double nextValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(!double.IsNaN(nextValue));Di2015NewLine        if (Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (Min > nextValue)Di2015NewLine                Min = nextValue;Di2015NewLine            if (Max < nextValue)Di2015NewLine                Max = nextValue;Di2015NewLine            SumTotal += nextValue;Di2015NewLine            SumOfSquares += nextValue * nextValue;Di2015NewLine            Count++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Min = Max = SumTotal = nextValue;Di2015NewLine            SumOfSquares = nextValue * nextValue;Di2015NewLine            Count = 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public double Avg()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return SumTotal / Count;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public double Variance()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (SumOfSquares * Count - SumTotal * SumTotal) / (Count * (Count - 1));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public double StdDeviation()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Math.Sqrt(Variance());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public Statistic Clone()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (Statistic)MemberwiseClone();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLine

4133996Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass AgentsDataDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static DataTabe ProcessDataTabe(DataTable dt)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Dictionary<string, AgentData> data = new Dictionary<string, AgentData>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < dt.Rows.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string name = dt.rows[i][0].ToString();Di2015NewLine            if (!data.ContainsKey(name))Di2015NewLine                data.Add(name, new AgentData);Di2015NewLine            int week = Convert.ToInt32(dt.rows[i][1]);Di2015NewLine            int score = Convert.ToInt32(dt.rows[i][2]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            data[name].Add(week, score);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (vat agentData in data.Values)Di2015NewLine            agentData.Process();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //now build new data table from dictionary and return itDi2015NewLine    }   Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass AgentDataDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public AgentData(string name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Name = name;Di2015NewLine        WeekScore = new Dictionary<int,int>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(int weekNumber, int score)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        WeekScore[weekNumber] = score;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Process()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int min = WeekScore.Keys.Min();Di2015NewLine        int max = WeekScore.Keys.Max();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < min; i++)Di2015NewLine            WeekScore.Add(i, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = min + 1; i < max; i++)Di2015NewLine            if (!WeekScore.ContainsKey(i))Di2015NewLine                WeekScore.Add(i, -1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string Name {get; private set;}  Di2015NewLine    public Dictionary<int, int> WeekScore { get; private set;}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4139834Di2015UniqueSeparatormatch_min = 2Di2015NewLinematch_max = 5Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinesearch_cache = Hashtable()Di2015NewLinefor (chunk_size = match_min; chunk_size < min(match_max+1, len(str)/2); chunk_size++){Di2015NewLine  for (start = 0; start < len(str) - chunk_size; start++){Di2015NewLine    sub = str.substring(start, start + chunk_size)Di2015NewLine    // We want to know if sub repeatsDi2015NewLine    if (sub not in search_cache)Di2015NewLine      search_cache[sub] = str.substring(start + chunk_size, len(str) - chunk_size + 1).find(sub)Di2015NewLine    if (search_cache[sub] != -1)Di2015NewLine      print "MATCH FOUND %s at %d-%d" % (sub, start, search_cache[sub])Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4143350Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate const MinimumLengthForBreak = 12;Di2015NewLineprivate const LineBreakString = "<br />";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string BreakLineIntoTwo(this HtmlHelper helper, string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(input)) return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    if (input.Length < MinimumLengthForBreak ) return input;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int pos = input.IndexOf(' ', input.Length / 2);Di2015NewLine    if (pos < 0) return input; // No space found, not checked in original codeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return input.Substring(0, pos) + LineBreakString + input.Substring(pos + 1);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4143523Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IProducer<T> : IStoppableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Notifies clients when a new item is produced.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    event EventHandler<ProducedItemEventArgs<T>> ItemProduced;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic interface IConsumer<T> : IStoppableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Performs processing of the specified item.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="item">The item.</param>Di2015NewLine    void ConsumeItem(T item);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic interface IStoppableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    void Stop();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4143523Di2015UniqueSeparatorItemProduced
4143523Di2015UniqueSeparatorConsumeItem
4143523Di2015UniqueSeparatorWorker
4143523Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Worker<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Object _lock = new Object();Di2015NewLine    private readonly Queue<T> _queuedItems = new Queue<T>();Di2015NewLine    private readonly AutoResetEvent _itemReadyEvt = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine    private readonly IProducer<T> _producer;Di2015NewLine    private readonly IConsumer<T> _consumer;Di2015NewLine    private volatile bool _ending = false;Di2015NewLine    private Thread _workerThread;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Worker(IProducer<T> producer, IConsumer<T> consumer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _producer = producer;Di2015NewLine        _consumer = consumer;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Start(ThreadPriority priority)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _producer.ItemProduced += Producer_ItemProduced;Di2015NewLine        _ending = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // start a new threadDi2015NewLine        _workerThread = new Thread(new ThreadStart(WorkerLoop));Di2015NewLine        _workerThread.IsBackground = true;Di2015NewLine        _workerThread.Priority = priority;Di2015NewLine        _workerThread.Start();Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Stop()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _producer.ItemProduced -= Producer_ItemProduced;Di2015NewLine        _ending = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // signal the consumer, in case it is idleDi2015NewLine        _itemReadyEvt.Set();Di2015NewLine        _workerThread.Join();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Producer_ItemProducedDi2015NewLine         (object sender, ProducedItemEventArgs<T> e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_lock) { _queuedItems.Enqueue(e.Item); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // notify consumer threadDi2015NewLine        _itemReadyEvt.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void WorkerLoop()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (!_ending)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _itemReadyEvt.WaitOne(-1, false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            T singleItem = default(T);Di2015NewLine            lock (_lock)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               if (_queuedItems.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine               {Di2015NewLine                   singleItem = _queuedItems.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine               }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (singleItem != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _consumer.ConsumeItem(singleItem);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // handle exception, fire an eventDi2015NewLine                    // or something. Otherwise thisDi2015NewLine                    // worker thread will die and youDi2015NewLine                    // will have no idea what happenedDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                lock (_lock)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (_queuedItems.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        singleItem = _queuedItems.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    } // WorkerLoopDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine} // WorkerDi2015NewLine
4143523Di2015UniqueSeparatorIProducer<IMail> mailCreator = new MailCreator();Di2015NewLineIConsumer<IMail> mailSender = new MailSender();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineWorker<IMail> worker = new Worker<IMail>(mailCreator, mailSender);Di2015NewLineworker.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// produce an item - worker will add it to theDi2015NewLine// queue and signal the background threadDi2015NewLinemailCreator.CreateSomeMail();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// following line will block this (calling) threadDi2015NewLine// until all items are consumedDi2015NewLineworker.Stop();Di2015NewLine
